title: Official Tecmo Ninja Gaiden NES & Arcade OST
description:
By request

This is a rip, this is the original and official soundtrack for Ninja Ryukenden (Ninja Gaiden in US) & (Shadow Warriors in Europe) for the NES and Arcade games released by Tecomo in 1989.

Ninja Gaiden ~ G.S.M. Tecmo 1

1. Rebirth of the Dragon Sword Legend (Ninja Gaiden Arrange Version) 6:46
